description: Kei is a horny guy who spends his days surfing the net & trying to fuck hot chicks. His only joy in life is pretending to be someone he’s not. One day surfing the net, he meets a classmate named Eve & their friendship begins to develop into something more steamy. Problem is, Eve falls in love with Kei’s alternate online identity. Will Kei be able to confess his love or will he forever be second place to his own alter ego?
title: Pure Mail
